name: Cognitive Enhancement Stack
mechanism: Selank modulates GABA and serotonin for anxiolytic effects. Semax enhances BDNF and NGF for cognitive performance. Together they provide balanced cognitive enhancement without stimulation

selank.timing: As needed for anxiety, or morning/afternoon

cycling: Can use daily for 4-6 weeks, then take 1-2 week break. Or use as-needed
synergy_notes: Selank reduces anxiety/stress while Semax enhances focus and performance - creating calm, focused state
